SELECT A.CAMP_NO , A.CAMP_NM , A.USER_ID , A.CAMP_TY , A.STATUS , A.DEPT_NO , A.REG_DT , A.REG_ID , A.UP_ID , A.UP_DT , A.CAMP_DESC , B.USER_NM , C.USER_NM REG_NM , D.DEPT_NM , E.CD_NM CAMP_TY_NM , F.CD_NM STATUS_NM FROM NEO_CAMPAIGN A , NEO_USER B , NEO_USER C , NEO_DEPT D , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C004' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) E , (SELECT CD, CD_NM FROM NEO_CD WHERE CD_GRP = 'C014' AND UILANG = #{uilang}) F WHERE A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID AND A.REG_ID = C.USER_ID AND A.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO AND A.CAMP_TY = E.CD AND A.STATUS = F.CD
ORDER BY CAMP_NO DESC
